title: Costumes are Always Full of Dreams!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Ruby-chan, about our next costume….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah! Ruby also wants to talk about that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ruby-chan too!? Thank god~! I kinda have some of idea piled up, so I really wanted to tell someone about them~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Is it from the DVD that we all watched the other day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh!? How did you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Because Ruby got some from that too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That movie’s costumes were really lovely right! I fell in love with the swan dress<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>The rabbit motif costume that the other one wore was also really cute isn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah! Then, “Isn’t it too big!?” or so I thought about the waist ribbon, but when it moved it looked just like fairy wings….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You really want to make costumes like that for Aqours too right! Ruby also wrote a memo for these ideas! Look look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
